title: Simulation Analy & Dsgn
description: Discrete event simulation methodology emphasizing the statistical basis for simulation modeling and analysis. Overview of computer languages and simulation design applied to various industrial situations.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ISYE 3030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ISYE 3232 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
